reviews.review:
Now I only want you
gone
I'm new to PC gaming, so this is a new experience for me. This game is phenomenal. Very creative and fun.
hard, fun, funny, and great game
honestly pretty good story along with some really creative and intuitive puzzles. about 5-10 hours of content for singleplayer main story
building off of Portal 1, and improves on every aspect. play it.
Absolute classic. If you enjoy any kind of puzzle/problem solving game, plus sci-fi you'll have an enjoy.

Portal 2




Pros- 

#1.Better than Portal 1 but I still like Portal 1

#2.I like the puzzle difficulty of 2  and I know I had to look up how to beat at least one of them the first time I played it

#3.They do not mention cake at all in Portal 2 and that got annoying in Portal 1 because it made me want to eat cake haha

#4.Co-Op multiplayer mode  - I have not tried this yet because I really do not care but it is cool they added it

#5.Workshop chambers - I have not tried this either but more Portal 2 is more cool

#6.Graphics still look good in 2021





Cons-

#1.My biggest problem with this game is not knowing where to go at times and the parts that tease us that have nothing to do with where to go or the puzzle

This happens in both Portal 1 and 2 and it is annoying in both but it does make them harder.One example in Portal 2 is around the part you pick her up as the potato you can go back to the part you came from and there is a door with the green enter sign on it only there is literally no reason for it to be there.You can open the door and go back the way you came only there is no reason to do that so why is the door there? 

This is an example where it confused me and the door should not of been there.I am sure many who have beat the game even more than once have never found this mystery door that opens.There is more examples than this but you get my point

The first time I played it I got lost/confused just trying to find the next puzzle at times.Some parts it is really obvious and others it is not at all

I do not have a problem with once I am at a puzzle and see where the exit is and have to figure it out.At some points finding out where to go is not obvious enough and I do not mean when you can see the puzzle exit


#2.They removed the companion cube.They had cubes you could use but it was not the companion cube.I think they should of had a few puzzles with it.After you beat the game she gives you a companion cube so that is its only cameo for portal 2


#3.I thought there was too much Cave Johnson and not enough of either boss

He had a few funny lines where the writing was good but at least half of what he said I did not think it was interesting or funny

I would of rather heard either boss have half of his lines where they said something else that was funny or interesting after we beat a puzzle or I would of had other writers improve half of what Cave Johnson said to make him more funny


#4.The final boss battle was too easy





The Bottom Line -


This is a great Valve game that everyone should try.Get Portal 1 and 2 on sale and try them.

There is a new game called Superliminal that is a puzzle game that looks like it could be a cousin of Portal.I want to try it.
portale 2 is a great game with comady puzels and new and intesting macanics
oyun çok güzel, oynarken hem beyninizi  zorluyorsunuz hemde eğleniyorsunuz hikayeside ayrı bir güzel genel olarak oyun çok  yaratıcı

GOTY DE LA VIDA!!

No te podes morir sin jugar a este juego.
I loved the lore and how it looks.
Good puzzle game with good story

¿Te gustó Portal 1?
¿Quieres una historia similar, pero mejor y más larga?
Este es tu juego, sin duda.
11/10
Classic puzzle solving game with a fun and engaging atmosphere and story. Well worth 10 bucks any day.
Its a fun concept, with an interesting story/lore which we see more of in Portal 2. Ageless. Doesn't feel dated at all.
VERY GOOD GAME I LOVE IT AND UR CHARACTER IS FIT

This is one of the most enjoyable games of my life. Honestly, I played it with a friend two yeras ago and we miss the game since then. It has very fun puzzles that when you solve you feel awesome and clever. The portal guns are so fun to use. The way they implemented puzzles are great. Every stage is another challenge and it only gets more fun not the other way around. The only con is that it's approximately 11 hours. I think this is very short, I wish this game lasts a lot more or Valve grows the balls and make Portal 3 rather than earning all their money from Steam.
Muy entretenido y desafiante. Te deja con ganas de mas
it has portals. and it is a great puzzle game
Un puzzle para pasar el tiempo, te entretienen mucho.
Best game ever. Story is amazing, so are the levels.
пойдет спину с помощью портала почесать

Jogo que parece que eu estou chapado, entro de um lado e saio do outro fico sem entender nada, como seria se essa tecnologia existisse na vida real? facilitaria a vida dos assaltantes de bancos? são perguntas que eu tenho quando jogo esse jogo. Por isso, dou nota 4 de 5.
i recomend this game for speedrunners ;)
never hooked me like the first

Öncelikle Selamın Aleyküm :D 
Bir arkadaşınızda bu oyun beyin patlamaları, eğlence ve makara kukara ile geçiyoo :D

Valve'ın yaptığı en iyi oyun olduğunu düşünüyorum. Hem hikayesi hem bulmaca ceşitliliği ile bir devam oyununun nasıl olması gerektiğini herkese gösteren bi oyun. Almayı planlıyorsanız 1. oyun ile birlikte alın hem hikaye bütünlüğü açısından daha iyi olur hem de oyundaki gelişmeyi daha iyi hissedersiniz. Ayrıca sevgilinizle beraber co-op oynamak çok keyiflidir. Ben beceremedim belki başkası becerir.
A really great game, especially for the price. I'd expect this game to be $60, even for its age. Overall 10/10.
Lo juego siempre que voy a cagar. 10/10
tam manasıyla efsane bir oyun. klasiklerden birisi. kesinlikle oynamalısınız.
the game is a little confusing at times but the price is super good for the content of the game.

its a very fun game
theres single player where you and wheatly go and beat glados again in portal 1 but somthing happens else, then in this Pit, you and glados has to defeat wheatly

in coop, you and your partner go and find the humans glados needs help on
theres 2 endings but not spoiling it

What i like from Portal 2 is the atmosphere of the lab and the new variety of puzzle.
it gave me such a fresh and fun experience which imo kinda better than the predecessor. Overall the story is amazing, and the game is so so worth it. Such a shame none of my friend bought this game to play co-op with.

One of the best story and puzzle games on Steam.
Melhor jogo já feito em toda a história, lindo demais
This is probably my favorite singleplayer game I have ever played. Definitely worth buying.
Este juego me esta dando un dolor de cabeza inmenso. Esta divertido.
realy good easy to learn and good story.

Juegazo para pasarse solo o en cooperativo, muy recomendado, para ser un titulo del 2011 tienes unas buenas texturas y graficos, una mecanica de juego unica y te hace pensar para que no se te mueran las neuronas por ver hentai. Recomendadisimo de nuevo. No recomendado en caso de que no te guste resolver puzzles pues el juego va de eso pero aun asi no deberias perderte este titulo. 
Como dato adicional hay mas niveles con mecanicas nuevas gracias al workshop donde la gente crea cosas increibles.

Edicion despues de pasar el modo solitario:
Bueno despues de haber jugando el coop y reido con mi amigo y nuestros fallos, en serio disfrutre del modo historia, mas que nada por los dialogos de GladOS y Wheatly o como se escriba. En serio es un juegazo y lo recomiendo un monton. Quedara en mis recuerdos por siempre uwu
очень крутая игра и крутой  сюжет
